text: Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Narɨ ŋgandara. Got Mosesɨŋ ambahi, narɨŋandɨ nañɨŋgitakɨñaŋ ambami, Muhɨm vana andɨrɨm kuyusɨhɨrata narɨŋandɨ kuyu ha tɨkatɨkatɨramata kandɨsɨkwɨsɨkwɨ kuma yawi vata maŋambamara. Kandɨsɨkwɨsɨkwɨ kuma yawi vataŋgata, Aru nɨmandu tamɨŋgañɨ ambɨrɨmandɨra maña andɨmara, vamba ambami.
